mails.subject: Request for Information
mails.content: Hi, I hope this email finds you well. I'm reaching out to request more information about your product. Can you provide me with pricing and availability details? Thank you in advance for your help.

mails.subject: Change of Meeting Time
mails.content: Good morning, I apologize for any inconvenience but I need to reschedule our meeting from tomorrow at 2pm to Thursday at 10am. Please let me know if this works for you. Again, I apologize for any inconvenience.

mails.subject: Feedback Request
mails.content: Dear customer, we value your opinion and would greatly appreciate it if you could take a few minutes to complete our survey. Your feedback will help us improve our products and services. Thank you for your time.

mails.subject: Job Interview Confirmation
mails.content: Hello, I'm writing to confirm your upcoming job interview scheduled for next Monday at 9am. Please let us know if you have any questions or concerns. We look forward to meeting with you.

mails.subject: Quarterly Report
mails.content: Hi team, attached you will find the quarterly report for our department. Please take the time to review it and let me know if you have any questions or concerns. Thank you for your hard work this quarter!
